reviewText: My mum used to watch this show when we were kids and recently mentioned how much she loved Sunday nights when all was quiet and she could get stuck into this - her 80th is next month so we got her the first 3 series to give her a trip down memory lane! :)
Great drama for such an old series. Very good acting and very interesting storyline. I watched this show as a teenager when it first came out and I think it's even better now.

A very good series that I first saw at the beginning of the 70's, just as I expected and remembered
1 of 5 sets I have bought.
